Question
========
  
In a clinical study boys and girls are randomly assigned to one of four treatments for internalizing problems. At the end of the treatment period, internalizing problems are measured by means of a questionnaire. Which analysis technique should be used to investigate whether the four treatments are equally effective, and whether this differs for boys and girls?

  
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple logistic regression.
* ANCOVA.
* Twoway ANOVA.
* Oneway ANOVA.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
